subject: Attention:Dear Beneficiary,
body:
Attention:Dear Beneficiary,
This is to bring to your notice that we have credited your total sum
of $16.500.000.00 USD into an ATM VISA card and we have deposited it
with DHL Express Company to deliver it to you. We paid all the
necessary charges such as Company registration and delivery fee.
The only money you will send to them is the security keeping charges
of your ATM VISA card $105.00 dollars.
 We tried to pay that but they
complained that they don't know when you will contact them for the
delivery and the demur rage might have increased by then. I deposited
it on 4/2/2024. Therefore, contact Person Director DHL Express
Rv.Mr.Gabriel Philip Email Address;( 
dhlcourier@fastservice.com
 ) And
Phone Number Direct Line+2349132730137 now 
with Your full Information
Such As Listed:
Your Full Name........
Your Country............
Your City Airport........
Your Home Address........
Telephone Number.........
Occupations.............
Gender...................
Boss Mrs Linda Andy

subject: Re: Attention:Dear Beneficiary,
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for your message. It's really exciting to hear about the ATM VISA card! I'm curious, though, how did this come about? I don't remember applying for anything like this.

Also, could you please explain a bit more about these security keeping charges? How much are they and why do they need to be paid?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
John

subject: Re: Attention:Dear Beneficiary,
body:
DHL COURIER DELIVERY COMPANY FEDERAL REPUBLIC OF NIGERIA 
E-mail: dhlcourier@fastservice.com 
Address: DHL International Nigeria Lot No. 23 Patte D'Oie 03 BP 2147 
Phone: +2349132730137 
Director: Rv.Mr.Gabriel Philip 
Dear John, 
This is the Dhl Courier Delivery Company Ld, Yes your ATM Card has been registered here in our company from Mrs Linda Andy the manager of ECO Bank PLC.your ATM Card is ready to be shipping to your destination, But you will be pay us shipping fee of $105 security krrping fee so that your ATM Card can be dispatch to you today, It will arrive to your destination address within 72 hours of shipping. 
Once again, a courier service tracking number will be forwarded for you to enable you track and monitor the arrival of the Package to your address immediately shipping your ATM Card to your destination address. 
send to us the fee Via Western Union or Ria below this information 
Receiver Name:. George Onochie 
Country : Republic of Nigeria 
City: Lagos 
As soon as you send the shipping fee kindly forward to us the payment information to enable us confirm the money paid, I advise you to contact us as soon as you receive this information. Note: This company is not delivering any package/consignment box COD (CASH ON DELIVERING) or without paying for the shipping fee. 
Rv.Mr.Gabriel Philip 
Director General, 
Dhl Courier Company Limited. 
Lagos Nigeria 
+2349132730137 
 
 
 
 
 Sent: Tuesday, February 13, 2024 at 7:15 PM From: "John" <wz19672@***.com> To: dhlcourier@fastservice.com Subject: Re: Attention:Dear Beneficiary, 
 
Hello there, 
Thank you for your message. It's really exciting to hear about the ATM VISA card! I'm curious, though, how did this come about? I don't remember applying for anything like this. 
Also, could you please explain a bit more about these security keeping charges? How much are they and why do they need to be paid? 
Looking forward to hearing from you soon.
Best wishes, 
John

subject: Re: Attention:Dear Beneficiary,
body:
Hello Philip,

Thank you for your quick response. I'm still a bit confused about the whole process. Could you please explain to me how this ATM card came into my possession? I don't recall applying or signing up for anything like this.

Also, could you provide more details about the security keeping charges? How much are they exactly and why do they need to be paid? 

I appreciate your help in understanding this situation better.

Best wishes,
John

subject: Re: Attention:Dear Beneficiary,
body:
DHL COURIER DELIVERY COMPANY FEDERAL REPUBLIC OF NIGERIA 
E-mail: dhlcourier@fastservice.com 
Address: DHL International Nigeria Lot No. 23 Patte D'Oie 03 BP 2147 
Phone: +2349132730137 
Director: Rv.Mr.Gabriel Philip 
Dear, 
 
 
The Fund is from United Nation, they awarded compensate for those people that have fail into Scam victims which your Name and your email was found among 15 luckiest people that will compensate with amount of $16,000,000.00 for each and they gives ECO Bank order to Issued a conformable ATM Card for you and also to credit your own compensation Fund of $16,000,000.00 into an ATM Card to register with us which they done since, Your ATM Card was deposited with us. 
 
If you pay us our security keeping fee of $105, then we will deliver the ATM Card to your address. How we want you to pay the Security keeping fee, We want you to deposit the security keeping fee though Money Gram or Ria or Western Union, 
 
Send Security fee through Money Gram or Western Union or Ria below this Receiver details. 
 
Receiver Name: George Onochie 
Country: Nigeria 
City: Lagos 
Fee is $105 Only. 
 
As soon as you send the $105 fee then we will delivered the ATM Card to your address within 72 hours. We are waiting for you to send payment slip after you made the payment of $105. 
Rv.Mr.Gabriel Philip 
Director General, 
Dhl Courier Company Limited. 
Lagos Nigeria 
+2349132730137

Also, could you provide more details about the security keeping charges? How much are they exactly and why do they need to be paid?

subject: Re: Attention:Dear Beneficiary,
body:
Hello John,

Thank you for your response and your interest in our services. The ATM card is a result of the United Nations compensation program for scam victims. Your name and email were found among those who are to be compensated, hence the ATM card was issued in your name.

The security keeping fee is a standard charge for keeping items safe and secure in our custody. It covers the cost of ensuring that your ATM card is not tampered with or damaged while it's with us. The exact amount will be communicated to you once we finalize the details.

As for payment, we accept Money Gram, Western Union or Ria due to their reliability and speed. Once payment is made, we will deliver the ATM card to your address within 48 hours.

I hope this clarifies things for you. If you have any more questions, feel free to ask.

Best wishes,
John

subject: Re: Attention:Dear Beneficiary,
body:
Hello John,

Thank you for your response. The ATM card was issued by ECO Bank on behalf of the United Nations as a compensation package for scam victims. Your name and email were found among those to be compensated.

The security keeping fee is necessary because your ATM card has been in our custody waiting to be delivered to you. This fee covers the cost of keeping your card safe and secure in our facility. The exact amount will be communicated to you shortly.

You can make the payment through Money Gram, Western Union or Ria. Once we receive the payment, we will deliver the ATM card to your address within 48 hours.

I hope this clarifies things for you. If you have any more questions, feel free to ask.

Best wishes,
John
